languages.text: "Нечасто людям и ксеносам выпадает шанс разрешить конфликт мирно. Я поддерживаю Леди Кассию".

traits.locale_text: "Нечасто людям и ксеносам выпадает шанс разрешить конфликт мирно. Я поддерживаю Леди Кассию".

languages.text: "Seldom do humans and xenos get the chance to resolve their conflicts without violence. I second Lady Cassia's proposal."
languages.original_text: "Нечасто людям и ксеносам выпадает шанс разрешить конфликт мирно. Я поддерживаю Леди Кассию".

traits.locale_text: "Seldom do humans and xenos get the chance to resolve their conflicts without violence. I second Lady Cassia's proposal."
"Seldom do humans and xenos get the chance to resolve their conflicts without violence. I second Lady Cassia's proposal."
"Seldom do humans and xenos get the chance to resolve their conflicts without violence. I second Lady Cassia's proposal."
"Seldom do humans and xenos get the chance to resolve their conflicts without violence. I second Lady Cassia's proposal."
"Seldom do humans and xenos get the chance to resolve their conflicts without violence. I second Lady Cassia's proposal."
"Seldom do humans and xenos get the chance to resolve their conflicts without violence. I second Lady Cassia's proposal."

languages.text: 「人類と異種族が暴力沙汰なしに対立を解消する機会は滅多にあるまい。レディ・カシアの提案に賛成だ」
languages.original_text: "Seldom do humans and xenos get the chance to resolve their conflicts without violence. I second Lady Cassia's proposal."

traits.locale_text: 「人類と異種族が暴力沙汰なしに対立を解消する機会は滅多にあるまい。レディ・カシアの提案に賛成だ」

languages.text: “人类和异形很少能有机会通过暴力之外的方式解决冲突，我赞成卡西娅女士的提议。”
languages.original_text: "Seldom do humans and xenos get the chance to resolve their conflicts without violence. I second Lady Cassia's proposal."

traits.locale_text: “人类和异形很少能有机会通过暴力之外的方式解决冲突，我赞成卡西娅女士的提议。”

languages.text: « Les humains et les xénos ont rarement l'occasion de résoudre un conflit sans avoir recours à la violence. J'approuve la proposition de dame Cassia. »
languages.original_text: "Seldom do humans and xenos get the chance to resolve their conflicts without violence. I second Lady Cassia's proposal."

traits.locale_text: « Les humains et les xénos ont rarement l'occasion de résoudre un conflit sans avoir recours à la violence. J'approuve la proposition de dame Cassia. »

languages.text: «No es común que los humanos y los xenos puedan resolver sus diferencias sin violencia. Secundo la propuesta de lady Cassia».
languages.original_text: "Seldom do humans and xenos get the chance to resolve their conflicts without violence. I second Lady Cassia's proposal."

traits.locale_text: «No es común que los humanos y los xenos puedan resolver sus diferencias sin violencia. Secundo la propuesta de lady Cassia».

languages.text: "Selten bekommen Menschen und Xenos die Gelegenheit, ihre Konflikte gewaltfrei beizulegen. Ich unterstütze Lady Cassias Vorschlag."
languages.original_text: "Seldom do humans and xenos get the chance to resolve their conflicts without violence. I second Lady Cassia's proposal."

traits.locale_text: "Selten bekommen Menschen und Xenos die Gelegenheit, ihre Konflikte gewaltfrei beizulegen. Ich unterstütze Lady Cassias Vorschlag."

languages.text: "İnsanlarla zenoların anlaşmazlıklarını şiddete başvurmadan çözebilmesi, sık görülen bir şey değildir. Leydi Cassia'nın teklifini destekliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Seldom do humans and xenos get the chance to resolve their conflicts without violence. I second Lady Cassia's proposal."

traits.locale_text: "İnsanlarla zenoların anlaşmazlıklarını şiddete başvurmadan çözebilmesi sık görülen bir şey değildir. Leydi Cassia'nın teklifinin arkasındayım."
